channel.title: Microsoft on IMMIBLOGGHENICLOUD

item.title: SCCM collections
item.description: Intro These are various queries to populate the collections in SCCM, which will be updated in the future. Additionally, at the bottom, I have included a script for the automatic addition of the collections shown in this post Collections Collection Boundary Groups Based This query adds the devices that are part of a specific Boundary Group to the collection. It's necessary to modify the query by inserting the name of your own group.
